com.facebook.buck.log

Interface ConsoleHandlerState

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ThreadIdToCommandIdMapper

    public interface ConsoleHandlerState
extends ThreadIdToCommandIdMapper
    How the ConsoleHandler is supposed to behave for a particular thread. Maintained globally by GlobalStateManager.
